thread.title: Emails more romantic than phone calls
thread.title_full: Emails more romantic than phone calls

title: Emails more romantic than phone calls
text:
New study finds sending an email is better than leaving a voicemail when asking someone on a date MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au New study finds sending an email is better than leaving a voicemail when asking someone on a date MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au Would would have thought a 90s rom com would have predicted the future? IT appears Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan were predicting the future of dating with the 1998 cinematic masterpiece Youâ€™ve Got Mail. 
According to a study from Indiana University, sending an email is more romantic than leaving a voicemail when communicating with a potential lover. 
Co-author Alan R Dennis said the finding should not come as a shock given the tech savvy attitude held by millennials. Other Stories
